verses.verse: וַיִּוָּעַ֣ץ <S%H3289><s%> consulted דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> And David עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with שָׂרֵ֧י <S%H8269><s%> with the captains הָאֲלָפִ֛ים <S%H505><s%> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> and hundreds לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every נָגִֽיד׃ <S%H5057><s%> [and] with every leader

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> And David לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> to all קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> unto all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> seems ט֜וֹב <S%H2895><s%> If [it seem] good וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> is from יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto you and [that it be] of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God נִפְרְצָה֙ <S%H6555><s%> abroad נִשְׁלְחָ֞ה <S%H7971><s%> let us send עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto אַחֵ֣ינוּ <S%H251><s%> unto our brethren הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֗ים <S%H7604><s%> every where [that are] left בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אַרְצ֣וֹת <S%H776><s%> in all the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <S%H5973><s%> also הַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <S%H3548><s%> and with them [also] to the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> and Levites בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> [which are] in their cities מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <S%H4054><s%> [and] suburbs וְיִקָּבְצ֖וּ <S%H6908><s%> that they may gather אֵלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H413><s%> and

וְנָסֵ֛בָּה <S%H5437><s%> And let us bring again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not דְרַשְׁנֻ֖הוּ <S%H1875><s%> to us for we enquired בִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> not at it in the days שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> And all the congregation לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that they would do so כֵּ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> so כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָשַׁ֥ר <S%H3474><s%> was right הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> for the thing בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of all the people

וַיַּקְהֵ֤ל <S%H6950><s%> together דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> So David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> all Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from שִׁיח֥וֹר <S%H7883><s%> from Shihor מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even לְב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> even unto the entering חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hemath לְהָבִיא֙ <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God מִקִּרְיַ֖ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <S%H7157><s%> from Kirjathjearim

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel בַּעֲלָ֔תָה <S%H1173><s%> to Baalah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִ֖ים <S%H7157><s%> [that is] to Kirjathjearim אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לִיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> which [belonged] to Judah לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to bring up מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> thence the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> of God יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelleth הַכְּרוּבִ֖ים <S%H3742><s%> [between] the cherubims אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where נִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> is called שֵֽׁם׃ <S%H8034><s%> whose name

וַיַּרְכִּ֜יבוּ <S%H7392><s%> And they carried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֲגָלָ֣ה <S%H5699><s%> cart חֲדָשָׁ֔ה <S%H2319><s%> in a new מִבֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house אֲבִינָדָ֑ב <S%H41><s%> of Abinadab וְעֻזָּ֣א <S%H5798><s%> and Uzza וְאַחְי֔וֹ <S%H283><s%> and Ahio נֹהֲגִ֖ים <S%H5090><s%> drave בָּעֲגָלָֽה׃ <S%H5699><s%> the cart

וְדָוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel מְשַׂחֲקִ֛ים <S%H7832><s%> played לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹ֑ז <S%H5797><s%> with all [their] might וּבְשִׁירִ֤ים <S%H7892><s%> and with singing וּבְכִנֹּרוֹת֙ <S%H3658><s%> and with harps וּבִנְבָלִ֣ים <S%H5035><s%> and with psalteries וּבְתֻפִּ֔ים <S%H8596><s%> and with timbrels וּבִמְצִלְתַּ֖יִם <S%H4700><s%> and with cymbals וּבַחֲצֹצְרֽוֹת׃ <S%H2689><s%> and with trumpets

וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> And when they came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גֹּ֣רֶן <S%H1637><s%> unto the threshingfloor כִּידֹ֑ן <S%H3592><s%> of Chidon וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> put forth עֻזָּ֜א <S%H5798><s%> Uzza אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand לֶאֱחֹז֙ <S%H270><s%> to hold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because שָֽׁמְט֖וּ <S%H8058><s%> stumbled הַבָּקָֽר׃ <S%H1241><s%> for the oxen

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעֻזָּ֔א <S%H5798><s%> against Uzza וַיַּכֵּ֕הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and he smote עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> him because he put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הָאָר֑וֹן <S%H727><s%> to the ark וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> and there he died שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

וַיִּ֣חַר <S%H2734><s%> was displeased לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because פָרַ֧ץ <S%H6555><s%> had made יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> a breach בְּעֻזָּ֑א <S%H5798><s%> upon Uzza וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> is called לַמָּק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> wherefore that place הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he פֶּ֣רֶץ עֻזָּ֔א <S%H6560><s%> Perezuzza עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וַיִּירָ֤א <S%H3372><s%> was afraid דָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֵ֚יךְ <S%H1963><s%> How אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> shall I bring אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> for אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הֵסִ֨יר <S%H5493><s%> brought דָּוִ֧יד <S%H1732><s%> So David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָר֛וֹן <S%H727><s%> not the ark אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> him עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> [home] to himself to the city דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיַּטֵּ֕הוּ <S%H5186><s%> but carried it aside אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house עֹבֵֽד־ אֱדֹ֖ם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom הַגִּתִּֽי׃ <S%H1663><s%> the Gittite

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <S%H3427><s%> remained אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> And the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> of God עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> with the family עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom בְּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> months וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house עֹבֵֽד־ אֱדֹ֖ם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לֽוֹ׃ פ
